#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

long gcd(long a, long b)
{
        if(b==0)
                return a;
        else
                return gcd(b, a%b);
}

int main()
{
        long t,n,m;
        cin >> t;
        while(t--)
        {
                cin >> n >> m;
                if(n==1)
                        cout << m << endl;
                else if(m==1)
                        cout << n << endl;
                else
                        cout << gcd(n-1,m-1)+1 << endl;
        }
        return 0;
}
